dict.acceptation: 心理的；精神上的，精神（现象）的；心理学（上）的；关于心理学的；

sent.orig: When you go through it, you cease to derive your identity from your psychological, mind-made form.
sent.trans: 当你通过它，你停止接受来自心理，心智创造的形相(psychological,mind-madeform)的认同。

sent.orig: Thecalled psychological testing is the use of a psychological testing software applications for psychological analysis.
sent.trans: 所谓心理检测是指采用一种心理检测软件对应征青年的心理情况进行分析。

sent.orig: By analyzing documentary and investigation, contest psychological characteristics of basketball players, bring forward psychological training methods.
sent.trans: 运用文献资料法、调查研究等方法，分析篮球运动员的心理特征，提出心理训练的方法。

sent.orig: Group psychological guidance is on effective means for college students to direct psychological health instruction.
sent.trans: 团体心理辅导是对大学生进行心理健康教育的一种有效形式。

sent.orig: Psychological services are provided to inmates to enhance their psychological well-being in the rehabilitation process.
sent.trans: 临床心理学家为犯人提供心理辅导服务，以便在康复过程中促进他们的精神健康。
